subject: Drug Abuse and Traffic
Basketball
Basketball (College)
lead_paragraph: Jonathan Hargett was once thought to be the first point guard to jump from high school to the N.B.A., but that was before a tumultuous college career and a prison sentence. He blames himself for his past decisions, which include years of abusing marijuana.
